item.title: Megan add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Megan add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Megan add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "The greatness of a man is not in how much wealth he acquires, but in his integrity and his ability to affect those around him positively" -- Bob Marley

item.title: Megan add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "I often warn people: "Somewhere along the way, someone is going to tell you, 'There is no "I" in team.' What you should tell them is, 'Maybe not. But there is an "I" in independence, individuality and integrity." -- George Carlin

item.title: Megan add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "In the end you should always do the right thing even if it's hard." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Megan add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Whoever is careless with the truth in small matters cannot be trusted with important matters" -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Megan add a quote by Oprah Winfrey
item.description: "Real integrity is doing the right thing, knowing that nobody’s going to know whether you did it or not." -- Oprah Winfrey

item.title: Megan add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "But there are times in this harum-scarum world when figuring out the right thing to do is quite simple, but doing the right thing is simply impossible...." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Megan add a quote by Frederick Douglass
item.description: "I prefer to be true to myself, even at the hazard of incurring the ridicule of others, rather than to be false, and to incur my own abhorrence." -- Frederick Douglass

item.title: Megan add a quote by Marcus Aurelius
item.description: "Waste no more time arguing about what a good man should be. Be one." -- Marcus Aurelius

item.title: Megan add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Integrity is doing the right thing, even when no one is watching." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Megan add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The impossible often has a kind of integrity to it which the merely improbable lacks." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Megan add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "The remedy for most marital stress is not in divorce. It is in repentance and forgiveness, in sincere expressions of charity and service. It is not in separation. It is in simple integrity that leads a man and a woman to square up their shoulders and meet their obligations. It is found in the Golden Rule, a time-honored principle that should first and foremost find expression in marriage." -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Megan add a quote by Marcus Aurelius
item.description: "If it is not right do not do it; if it is not true do not say it." -- Marcus Aurelius

item.title: Megan add a quote by Martin Luther King, Jr
item.description: "Every man must decide whether he will walk in the light of creative altruism or in the darkness of destructive selfishness." -- Martin Luther King, Jr

item.title: Megan add a quote by Spencer Johnson
item.description: "Integrity is telling myself the truth. And honesty is telling the truth to other people." -- Spencer Johnson

item.title: Megan add a quote by Andre Gide
item.description: "Be faithful to that which exists within yourself." -- Andre Gide

item.title: Megan add a quote by Henry James
item.description: "I don't want everyone to like me; I should think less of myself if some people did." -- Henry James

item.title: Megan add a quote by Barbara De Angelis
item.description: "Living with integrity means: Not settling for less than what you know you deserve in your relationships. Asking for what you want and need from others. Speaking your truth, even though it might create conflict or tension. Behaving in ways that are in harmony with your personal values. Making choices based on what you believe, and not what others believe." -- Barbara De Angelis

item.title: Megan add a quote by James E. Faust
item.description: "Honesty is more than not lying. It is truth telling, truth speaking, truth living, and truth loving." -- James E. Faust

item.title: Megan add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "One person of integrity can make a difference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Megan add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "It is easy to live for others, everybody does. I call on you to live for yourself." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Megan add a quote by Rainer Maria Rilke
item.description: "May what I do flow from me like a river, no forcing and no holding back, the way it is with children." -- Rainer Maria Rilke

item.title: Megan add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "Achievement of your happiness is the only moral purpose of your life, and that happiness, not pain or mindless self-indulgence, is the proof of your moral integrity, since it is the proof and the result of your loyalty to the achievement of your values." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Megan add a quote by Marcus Aurelius
item.description: "Do not act as if you were going to live ten thousand years. Death hangs over you. While you live, while it is in your power, be good." -- Marcus Aurelius

item.title: Megan add a quote by Carl Gustav Jung
item.description: "Wholeness is not achieved by cutting off a portion of one’s being, but by integration of the contraries." -- Carl Gustav Jung

item.title: Megan add a quote by Warren Buffett
item.description: "Somebody once said that in looking for people to hire, you look for three qualities: integrity, intelligence, and energy. And if you don’t have the first, the other two will kill you. You think about it; it’s true. If you hire somebody without [integrity], you really want them to be dumb and lazy." -- Warren Buffett

item.title: Megan add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "Integrity is the ability to stand by an idea." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Megan add a quote by Paolo Maurensig
item.description: "Life's temptations have the purpose of putting our spiritual integrity to the test. To yield to them, however, gives one a precarious and tormented satisfaction. But the worst temptations are those we give in to without getting anything in return except for the brutal discovery of our weakness." -- Paolo Maurensig

item.title: Megan add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "You can fool some of the people all of the time, and all of the people some of the time, but you can not fool all of the people all of the time." -- Abraham Lincoln
